ModMetaData.name: Reinforced Mechanoids 2.0
ModMetaData.author: Helixien, Taranchuk, OskarPotocki, Luizi, IcingWithCheeseCake, Sir Van, Reann_Shepard
ModMetaData.description: An expansion of vanilla Rimworld Mechanoids, adding new threats and gameplay mechanics that perfectly fit into vanilla Rimworld.
